website_summaries.verdict: This top-of-the-line pillow available in a regular size and a larger form is sure to impress.
pros: Thick, curved design allows head to be snugly cradled in any terrain
Inflatable design for supreme portability and function
Available in regular or large sizes
cons: Material tends to crinkle when head is moving

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy lining, doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This is an innovative and very useful product. At face value I absolutely loved mine. However, it lacks any semblance of durability. Within a year the lining of mine began to completely disintegrate and it will not hold air. If you are a serious outdoorsman/woman don't buy this product. You'll be charged a premium price for something that is certainly not premium quality. If I'd have known that the lifespan of this product was so short I would have bought a cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a bag of clothes
customer_reviews.text: I've always used my bag of clothes as a a camp pillow. And almost always, unless I was absolutely tired out, I'd find myself adjusting the "pillow" several times during the night. That doesn't help me get good sleep. I thought this pillow was a luxury item when I purchased it. After sleeping on it for several nights in a row, I've come to realize that it is almost a necessity. My quality of sleep is waaay better then before, and I don't even notice the tiny amount of space or weight it adds to my pack. Comfortable, strong, very easy to adjust, and packs down so small. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: PNW_SteveA

customer_reviews.title: Wish they made them for the bed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased to have purchased this pillow. The little baggy seems water proof. When I pulled it out of the bag it was so soft to the touch and that was the part your head doesn't rest on. This was amazingly easy to blow up. Two normal breaths and it's full. Deflates in seconds. Super comfy when resting your head. It was smaller than I imagined in my head but yet it's still perfect. I will probably invest in the larger one at some point. Wraps back easy and fits in it's bag perfectly. I can't wait to use it officially when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: returned. not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I found that if this pillow is not fully inflated, your head is forced to roll to whatever side of the pillow you have just a bit more weight on - until it's basically off the pillow - unless you hold the pillow with one hand to stabilize. If it's fully inflated, it's way too thick, even while I'm on my side. This may be in part because I have a fairly cushy mat, which allows the shoulder to sink down a bit. Just could not get comfortable on it. Will go back to small therm-a-rest cushion, even if larger pack-size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Monika W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pillow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these pillows!! We have never used pillows for backpacking so this is not a comparison, but they are light enough that it was not a concern which is why we have not tried pillows before, we just didn't want the weight. These pillows made a complete difference in our sleep. We woke up feeling restored!! They are easy to inflate with just a few breaths. They seem sturdy, and the side that has a soft feel is quite nice. Hen they deflate easily and go back in their compact little bag. AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best backpacking pillow I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money! Easily packs down to a very small size, is easily adjustable & durable. I wouldn't use it as a sit pad but it's probably tough enough for you to. I wish the tiny stuff sack was attached.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Such a comfortable Travel Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease with which I can inflate this pillow to the desired firmness. It's small and foldable into its own pouch. I can fit into a suitcase as well as a purse. When I didn't use it for actual sleep, I could use it as a lumbar pillow during the long drives. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Bikerchella

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying and packing
customer_reviews.text: Damn this is a comfortable pillow. Spent 2 weeks backpacking with it. Used to use my spare clothes as a pillow but this thing is so much better. Only advice I would have is to not assume that you should inflate it all the way. My comfort level was about 3/4 full. Test yours out before using it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Deflated, it basically fits in the palm of your hand so takes up no space in your pack. Takes a few puffs, and it's ready for use. It has a soft side that is cozy on your face and you can easily adjust the firmness by a special one-way valve it to make it to your liking. I used it for a week on trail, and so far it's a keeper! Could also bring it traveling by car, plane or train.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: and t's much more comfortable when it's slightly deflated
customer_reviews.text: For me this is the ultimate light camping pillow. The material is soft on the skin, and t's much more comfortable when it's slightly deflated. It inflates in just 3 breaths, and has a valve system so no air escapes when you put the air cap back on. It packs down to a tiny size. Also, be sure not to over inflate this item. I had one before that I over-inflated too much and it sprung a leak at the seam of the internal bladder. That was my fault, though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for back support too!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillow all the time for traveling in the care or on the plane. I use it for back support. For me, I only need to inflate a small amount to get the support and relief needed.
customer_reviews.author: CherryB

customer_reviews.title: Good Ultralight Pillow for Backpacking
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is extremely lightweight and fits into the hood of my sleeping bag. It has a flannel-feel surface, and it works best, IMHO, when it's not fully inflated. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is actually an incredibly comfortable inflatable pillow. I don't blow it up all the way so it still has some give and that's been the best and most comfortable method for me. And the fact it packs up smaller than a 12 oz soda can is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great for hammock
customer_reviews.text: Using this almost exclusively in hammock. For reading, I need my head propped up, so I fully inflate. For sleeping, I like it softer, so I let out about half the air. Always use the soft side, comfortable, no plasticky feeling. Inflates quickly and very small uninflated. Initially hesitated because of cost, but believe to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ross A. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how comfortable this little pillow is
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how comfortable this little pillow is!! I was skeptical about purchasing this pillow but after extensive research everyone had positive things to say about it and now I see why. I'm the type of person that sleeps with big latex and memory foam pillows and was afraid this pillow wouldn't suffice, but oh was I wrong. Great for backpacking as it compresses down smaller than a sock. I will definitely be purchasing another one of these down the road for my wife. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Finman11

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great! It inflates and deflates faster than any inflatable ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great! It inflates and deflates faster than any inflatable product that I've ever seen. Mind blowing. It's super small and light, the cover is sooo nice and soft, and its nicely flat. Totally great product
customer_reviews.author: Steve Markgraf

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and convenient to carry for backpackers
customer_reviews.text: I've used this plenty of times when I go backpacking on the weekends. It's very lightweight and super easy to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for packpacking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who went on a hunting backpacking excursion and he said it was perfect for him. It is lightweight enough to carry in his pack and comfortable to sleep on. Would purchase again and recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: I loved this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pillow! I toss and turn from left side to right side then front to back as I got more sunburned and this product kept up with my tossing and turning! I absolutely love the comfort of this pillow and its so very cool how small and compact it gets in its little bag! Very comfortable and durable! Very high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Dakotaam1

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think a lightweight inflatable pillow could be this comfortable. My others haven't been. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Harrybagels

customer_reviews.title: Slept like a baby on a 6 day backpacking trip through ...
customer_reviews.text: Slept like a baby on a 6 day backpacking trip through the Grand Tetons. Really comfortable and actually fits in the mummy hood of my sleeping bag. Best sleep I've ever had on the trail by far. I had no issues with it holding air.
customer_reviews.author: Vulture

customer_reviews.title: Great for my head and my back.
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for camping trips, back support on long flights, crashing on friend's floors. In fact, this is my second one, since I accidentally left my first on a plane. It packs down to about two thirds the size of a can of soda and is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Katushya

customer_reviews.title: I had to buy one as my Wife wont let me keep borrowing hers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camp pillow. small and very comfortable shape and material. I have had 2 other camp pillows and they were both disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Inflates and deflates super quickly. It only took three full breaths to ...
customer_reviews.text: Inflates and deflates super quickly. It only took three full breaths to fill the pillow. Rolls up in a nice little bag. The bag doesn't stay attached to the pillow, so it's easy to lose around the tent. You can attach it to the fill valve though, to prevent losing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and love the double valve design
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials, soft padding, and love the double valve design. Wish I had purchased the larger size though. I wanted it small for backpacking, but found that it was actually a little too small for me, however I see others have been happy with it, so it comes down to personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Crane

customer_reviews.title: Blissful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sleeping real good. I use at home, only 35% inflated it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Makes her happy, so I am happy
customer_reviews.text: GF loves it. So speaks for itself. Makes her happy, so I am happy. Fairly comfortable, but takes a little to get used too. It really helps to play with the amount of air in it to get the fit that is right for you.
customer_reviews.author: BLA

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best inflatable pillow I have every used.Easy adjustment, small, light, comfortable. My only issue was that I am a side sleeper and it isn't tall enough for me to sleep on my side easily, I was able to overcome by putting dirty clothes or my arm under it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Watson

customer_reviews.title: but it inflates and deflates nicely and rolls back up into the bag easily
customer_reviews.text: works as expected. its smaller than the pictures look, but it inflates and deflates nicely and rolls back up into the bag easily. get a bigger one if you roll around a lot
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pillow....
customer_reviews.text: I had been resisting getting a backpacking pillow. I don't know why, maybe pride? My clothes in a stuff sack are good enough... Well, I backpacked with a friend who had purchased this pillow....I had terrible pillow envy! I immediately ordered one for myself...I'm so glad I did! I love this so much. It fits right in the hood of my sleeping bag and doesn't move around when I do (which is a lot). It doesn't make that annoying crinkly noise either.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Highly recommend it. Easy inflate/deflate. My 2 nd one.
customer_reviews.author: snooty Jim

customer_reviews.title: Ultralight
customer_reviews.text: Ultralight, Easy to blow up with a couple of breaths, Very compact and small bag included
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not super comfy but for the weight savings and space savings ...
customer_reviews.text: Packs into a tiny bag! Not super comfy but for the weight savings and space savings I will take it
customer_reviews.author: Dani R

customer_reviews.title: A great comfortable light pillow
customer_reviews.text: I always have had to travel with a pillow so I decided to try this in order to travel light. It exceeded all my expectations. Easy to blow up, easy to adjust to the right fullness, comfortable. It is tiny when deflated and fits easily back into its stuff sack. And I slept great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light weight, small volume when packed. After five weeks of rugged use (packing up camp each morning) it started to deflate a little bit but still usable. I like the soft surface (not scratchy) and it tucked perfectly into my sleeping bag top.
customer_reviews.author: abracadabra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. See my review for the other size. I use them on airplanes for back support but I keep leaving them on the seat. Great, super lightweight and strong.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Ultralight, Ultra-Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable pillow that is extremely light and small. It's easy to inflate so that it cradles your head. This is worth the investment for backpacking. I would even take this to a hotel over a crummy hotel pillow. I have already given one as a gift- definitely a must on your backpacking gear list!
customer_reviews.author: J. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Get the largest size you can
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow, but I encourage you to buy the largest size. It's nominally heavier but so much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Backpacker SB

customer_reviews.title: ... yet on a camping trip but it sure feels comfortable. Extremely light and feels so good I may ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it yet on a camping trip but it sure feels comfortable. Extremely light and feels so good I may use it as my normal pillow.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: They love it. Perfect size packed up and
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. They love it. Perfect size packed up and comfy
customer_reviews.author: Rell

customer_reviews.title: easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Packs down super small and is very easy to inflate. Fits snuggly in the hood of my sleeping bag
customer_reviews.author: C8

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to some ultralight hiking comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is awesome. I'm an ultralight hiker so everything is considered for weight before I bring it. Its super comfortable, light, doesn't get clammy. I tried for a long time to use one of my stuff sacks filled with whatever as a pillow, but this upgrade is seriously worth every penny. Treat yourself to some ultralight hiking comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Reid - mikereidphotography dot com

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick
customer_reviews.text: It's not the most comfortable, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sibille

customer_reviews.title: Better than thermarest airhead
customer_reviews.text: Packs smaller and more comfy than the thermarest airhead which I used for about 4 years. I lost it and took a chance on this one. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow a lot- great for my hiking trips!
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: Work great in my hammock for camping
customer_reviews.text: Work great in my hammock for camping. But would almost prefer a crush sack of dirty clothes in my tent [...]
customer_reviews.author: Hikersreview

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pillow and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pillow and very comfortable. Used it on two backpacking trips now and I can't say enough good about it! If I find I have too much air I can take some out without having to turn on a light or even sit up! Packs away in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: DanoD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I think this is as comfortable as an air pillow can get. Very lightweight, compact, and very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: ... as my regular pillow because Aeros Pillow is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use as my regular pillow because Aeros Pillow is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is s ludesaver for my neck. Don't fill it super full for a very comfortable pillow
customer_reviews.author: Hez

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fill and deflate. Very comfortable and very compact when rolled up in travel bag. I may buy the larger size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. Gunyah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this on his long camping trip. Said it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Took it on the Long Trail and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Took it on the Long Trail and it was everything I needed. Pro tip: don't inflate all the way. If it's a little 'softer' it feels more like the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and so easy to blow up. Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the weight.
customer_reviews.text: Huge benefit when sleeping on the ground. Also nice to be able to adjust softness.
customer_reviews.author: brad769

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel size but deflates.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning it because it slowly begins deflating over the course of 20 to 30 minutes. I’ve made sure the cap is securely closed. I’m not sure what’s causing the air leak.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design! I've been dealing with sore necks for ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design! I've been dealing with sore necks for thirty years with my stuff sack pillows. Easy packing and terrific shape. I'm a big guy and this lightweight pillow is worth every penny. Gets stuffed in with the bag so it will always be there.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very light and easy to carry but not as comfortable as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Herrera

customer_reviews.title: This pillow was great. I used it in Haiti for a week
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was great. I used it in Haiti for a week. Stayed inflated the whole week at the same pressure. Comfortable, no neck or back pain.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my hammock. Works great so far! Its nice and soft, not noisy at all, and is extremely small when packed up. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it a few times a month while backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than my real pillow. Leave a tiny bit under-inflated for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver MuhleBruce

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best items I had taken during camping--it was great, really comfortable, easy to blow up and carry. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is soft and comfortable. Easy to inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness!!!
customer_reviews.text: Whether or not you are going light weight this pillow is awesome. Packs up ultra small. I am a hammock camper and this will stuff into my La Siesta Double stuff sack. No wasted room in pack. You can tell its a blow up pillow but surprises you with it's comfort. Was hesitant to buy, tried a friends then immediately threw my Teton camp pillow in the fire :)
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpacking pillow
customer_reviews.text: this pillow is awesome. It's smaller than my wife's fist when it's packed (she's tiny) and its big enough for my huge head when it's inflated. It literally takes me two breaths to fill it completely, then you just use your finger to let small amounts of air out, to customize the firmness to your liking. I went backpacking with a buddy last weekend and it pretty much blew his mind when I broke it out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: Sea to Summit Aeros Pillow Premium (Regular/Blue)
